attributes.action: Nominate Ian Gillan from Deep Purple for an MBE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For the past 37 years Deep Purple vocalist Ian Gillan has been at the top of his profession and has always been a great ambassador for Rock music around the world, for this I believe he deserves this honour to recognise his work in music.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Nominate Ian Gillan from Deep Purple for an MBE."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14979.asp

Prime Minister's Office
